idea: We want to bring one platform for all startups for getting the best in class professional support at a competitive price point. There are various standard services provided by  professionals at differential high prices making it difficult for the new entrepreneurs to avail their services and ending up in a high cost or non compliance resulting in to redundancy. We propose to fill the gap by creating a platform of professionals from varied disciplines to provide this services adopting to the best practices in the profession at the best prices.
